about_the_game:
Smug AI! The funniest and best anime voice assistant there is!

[A VERY REALISTIC ANIME GIRL ASWELL!!! WOW!!]

Using your microphone you can talk to her!
(Creator note: Talking to anime girls is awesome ngl!!!)

She can open apps, games, websites on your computer and much more!
(If she wants to... Shes a little bit of a bitch...)

Works on Desktop and VR and...
Has kept people laughing since 2021!

SO WHY PURCHASE HER!?!?!?!

Smug AI is VERY FUNNY!!!111!11!

Smug AI is the funniest anime assistant you’ll ever meet you sussy baka!!111!

 

She’s got jokes for almost any command you throw at her x3


She’s a Total Diva!!111!11!!

Smug AI understands you perfectly... she just chooses to mock you... smh...  

 


We tried to get her to chill, but… she has no chill... smh x2

She’s totally not looking at ur stuff??!?!?!

Trust me bro, she learned her lesson the hard way... (she can't unsee them...)

 


(Do clean ur search history tho, general life advice fr fr no cap)


She works in Desktop and VR!?!?!

It doesn't matter where you are, Smug Ai will still make jokes about you!!111!1

 

And she will (hopefully) help you both in Desktop and VR mode!!

Okay so how do you afford to do this!?

 

I can't lmao... 
Even tho Smug AI appeared on popular content creators like "qzeq" (please senpai notice me) and she’s adored by fans everywhere... updating her and making her the best she can be is expensive and time consuming...
So If you want to help us... buy her!! ':D

name: Smug AI (voice assistant)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3 4th generation CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A GPU that actually works
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Works with any audio card (may require external microphone)
  • VR Support: Works in Desktop and VR
  • Additional Notes: You need a microphone (to make the assistant hear you) + English (United States) [Speech Language Pack] installed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 2nd generation CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A GPU that actually works good
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Works with any audio card (may require external microphone)
  • VR Support: Works in Desktop and VR
  • Additional Notes: You need a microphone (to make the assistant hear you) + English (United States) [Speech Language Pack] installed
